bibl.title: The Divinity of the Pharaoh in Greek Sources.
bibl.note: The only explicit statement in a Greek source about the Egyptian king's divinity can be seen in Diodorus Siculus (1, 90, 2-3), who is most probably relying on Hecataeus of Abdera.
bibl.seg: Andrew W. Collins, The Divinity of the Pharaoh in Greek Sources.
The only explicit statement in a Greek source about the Egyptian king's divinity can be seen in Diodorus Siculus (1, 90, 2-3), who is most probably relying on Hecataeus of Abdera.
